member.name: T:Ellucian.WebServices.Core.Config.GeneralParameterCustomSection
member.summary: Represents the "DmiParameters" custom configuration section within a web application configuration file (app.config or web.config) under the "ColleagueSettings" section. This node has all of the required attributes for simplicity and there is currently a 1-to-1 mapping between a web application deployment and the environment. Validation occurs outside of this class so the exceptions can be caught and handled appropriately.

member.name: F:Ellucian.WebServices.Core.Config.GeneralParameterCustomSection.PARENT_NAME
member.summary: The name of the parent section group ("ColleagueSettings").

member.name: F:Ellucian.WebServices.Core.Config.GeneralParameterCustomSection.NAME
member.summary: The name of this custom configuration section ("DmiParameters").

member.name: F:Ellucian.WebServices.Core.Config.GeneralParameterCustomSection.FULL_PATH
member.summary: The full path to this custom configuration section ("ColleagueSettings/DmiParameters").

member.name: M:Ellucian.WebServices.Core.Config.GeneralParameterCustomSection.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Ellucian.WebServices.Core.Config.GeneralParameterCustomSection.UseDasDatareader
member.summary: True to use DAS Data Reader (via DB listener), false to use original Data Reader (via app listener)

member.name: P:Ellucian.WebServices.Core.Config.GeneralParameterCustomSection.UseDasDR
member.summary: Read-only property to retreive boolean from UseDasDatareader, provided for convenience.

member.name: T:Ellucian.WebServices.Core.Config.DasParameterCustomSection
member.summary: Represents the "DasParameters" custom configuration section within a web application configuration file (app.config or web.config) under the "ColleagueSettings" section. This node has all of the required attributes for simplicity and there is currently a 1-to-1 mapping between a web application deployment and the environment. Validation occurs outside of this class so the exceptions can be caught and handled appropriately.

member.name: F:Ellucian.WebServices.Core.Config.DasParameterCustomSection.PARENT_NAME
member.summary: The name of the parent section group ("ColleagueSettings").

member.name: F:Ellucian.WebServices.Core.Config.DasParameterCustomSection.NAME
member.summary: The name of this custom configuration section ("DmiParameters").

member.name: F:Ellucian.WebServices.Core.Config.DasParameterCustomSection.FULL_PATH
member.summary: The full path to this custom configuration section ("ColleagueSettings/DmiParameters").

member.name: M:Ellucian.WebServices.Core.Config.DasParameterCustomSection.#ctor
member.summary: Default Constructor

member.name: P:Ellucian.WebServices.Core.Config.DasParameterCustomSection.Settings
member.summary: Represents the name of the settings stored in Colleague.

member.name: P:Ellucian.WebServices.Core.Config.DasParameterCustomSection.Environment
member.summary: Represents the name of the Colleague environment.

member.name: P:Ellucian.WebServices.Core.Config.DasParameterCustomSection.Address
member.summary: Represents the IP address or host name of the Colleague Application Server.

member.name: P:Ellucian.WebServices.Core.Config.DasParameterCustomSection.Port
member.summary: Represents the port number of the Colleague Application Server.

member.name: P:Ellucian.WebServices.Core.Config.DasParameterCustomSection.Secure
member.summary: Read-only boolean property that determines if the secure flag was set in the configuration.

member.name: P:Ellucian.WebServices.Core.Config.DasParameterCustomSection.SecureFlag
member.summary: Boolean flag that determines the security setting when connecting to the Colleague Application Server.

member.name: P:Ellucian.WebServices.Core.Config.DasParameterCustomSection.CertificateHostnameOverride
member.summary: This name represents the certificate host name override the Colleague Application Server. This is useful when the external and internal host names do not match.

member.name: P:Ellucian.WebServices.Core.Config.DasParameterCustomSection.ConnectionPoolSizeOverride
member.summary: Override for the maximum size of the pooled persistent socket connections.

member.summary: The name of the parent section group ("ColleagueSettings").

member.name: P:Ellucian.WebServices.Core.Config.DmiSecurityParameterCustomSection.SharedSecret
member.summary: This string represents the shared secret used between .NET and Colleague (as defined on form WSPD) to secure inbound requests sent to the application server.

member.name: P:Ellucian.WebServices.Core.Config.DmiSecurityParameterCustomSection.DatabaseLogin
member.summary: This string represents the database login used to create a DAS connection.

member.name: P:Ellucian.WebServices.Core.Config.DmiSecurityParameterCustomSection.DatabasePassword
member.summary: This string represents the password for the database login.
